name: Rek'Sai
subtitle: the Void Burrower
description: An apex predator, Rek'Sai is a merciless Void-spawn that tunnels beneath the ground to ambush and devour unsuspecting prey. Her insatiable hunger has laid waste to entire regions of the once-great empire of Shurima—merchants, traders, even armed caravans, will go hundreds of miles out of their way to avoid her and her offspring's hunting grounds. All know that once Rek'Sai is seen on the horizon, death from below is all but guaranteed.

abilities.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
abilities.description: Rek'sai generates Fury by Attack and hitting with basic abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.

abilities.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
abilities.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.

abilities.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
abilities.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
abilities.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
